title: BayesianGroupAna.py
description: This program conducts Bayesian Group Analysis (BGA) on a list of regions of interest (ROIs). Compared to the conventional univariate GLM, BGA pools and shares the information across the ROIs in a multilevel system.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Summary of the brmsfit object from R.

rhats.title: Rhats
rhats.description: Rhats for each effect and x variable combination.

intercept_table.title: Intercept Table
intercept_table.description: Table with the MedianEst, StdDev, 2.50%, 5%, 50%, 95%, and 97.50% of each ROI for the Intercept term.

x_var_table.title: X Variable Table
x_var_table.description: The same table as the Intercept but for the specified x variable.
